Reviews.Title: “100% worth your money”
Reviews.Author: froso_palaska
Reviews.Content: hotel luxurious impressive clean quiet warm istanbul temperture low snowing sleep naked personnel helpful cheerful believe worth 35 euros night payed 1st floor double simple breakfast buffet included price situated near tram station stops sultanahmet near metro station leads straight airport hotel little stores sell stay restaurants sell delicious kebab 1 euro stay midnight stop returning late

Reviews.Content: condition hotel worthy condemned built mouldy falling apart barely functional lavatory cistern top fall lift button wall paper peeling carpet creating dust cleaning consists changing sheets smelly chemical short sheet covers mattress black mould stains water blood stains lumps god else disgusting severe allergic reaction night moved bruised legs trying past beds table tv joke matter cheap wasnt cheap stayed price izmir hotel condemned health authorities alerted saving grace bevy handsome courteous male staff hand bring hot water own cup tea pay 2 lire service cant faulted lovely breakfast usual turkish style hubby bring own coffee milk muesli orange juice didnt mind olives chilly tomatoes cucumber black coffeetea fresh bread

Reviews.Title: “This hotel was worse than being grounded by the volcanic Ash for 5 days.”
Reviews.Author: SminxZ
Reviews.Content: 50 euro night wasnt expecting grand fancy expected clean safe comfortable environment wash days travelling wandering skin definately travelling partner walls mouldy wallpaper falling dark stuffy hot top horrific smell bad barely sleep aggravated allergies shower properly towel rail broken complete dissapointment waste money location tucked dark corner resteraunts taxi drivers call people breakfast traditional turkish style bread olives cheeses cucumber tomatoe etc fine stage taste throat mold leaving day refunded simply miserable live sort standard promised
